author: Kate Davidson
title: Mnuchin Says IRS to Release New Tax Withholding Calculator Next Week
text:
Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin said Thursday the IRS will release a new calculator next week that allows taxpayers to double-check the amount that should be withheld from their paychecks under the new tax law.
The Treasury Department last month released updated withholding tables reflecting changes under the tax law, which the government said would boost paychecks for more than 90% of American workers. Employers were expected to implement the changes by Feb. 15.
...
